title: Onboarding - Image in Onboarding Video
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. View Onboarding Video
custom_expected: User should see MLB logo with "MLB" text

title: Onboarding - UIAlert - Bluetooth Permissions
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. User sees alert for Bluetooth permissions
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
"MLB" Would Like to Use Bluetooth

title: Onboarding - Favorite Team Selection
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. User hits Favorite Teams selection screen in onboarding
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
Select your favorite team(s) to personalize MLB App's home screen and scoreboard. You can change them at any time.

title: Onboarding - UIAlert - Location Permissions
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. Go through onboarding
4. After favorite team selection, user is prompted with Location permissions
custom_expected:
Text of alert should read: 
Allow "MLB" to access your location?

title: Onboarding - UIAlert - Push Notification Permissions
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. Go through onboarding
4. After push notification setting selection, user is prompted with Push Notification permissions
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
"MLB" Would Like to Send You Notifications

title: Onboarding Paywall - Fine Print
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. Go through onboarding
4. User will see paywall
custom_expected:
Fine print on paywall will read:
MLB Audio and MLB.TV are recurring subscriptions..

title: Team Page - UIAlert - First Time MLB App with Siri
Team Page - First Time Personalize MLB App Icon
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install MLB App
2. Set favorite team during onboarding
3. Complete onboarding
4. User should land on favorite team page
5. User will be prompted with "Personalize your home screen" pop-up
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
Select the [team] to change the MLB App icon on your home screen

title: Team Page - First Time Personalize MLB App Icon - MLB Icon
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install MLB App
2. Set favorite team during onboarding
3. Complete onboarding
4. User should land on favorite team page
5. User will be prompted with "Personalize your home screen" pop-up
custom_expected: MLB logo should be updated icon, with blue gradient background

title: Team Page - Settings - Home Screen Icon
custom_preconds:
MLB App is installed
Home screen icon remains default MLB
custom_steps:
1. Nav to a team page
2. Scroll down and tap on "Settings"
3. Note "Set Home Screen Icon" icon
custom_expected: MLB logo should be updated icon, with blue gradient background

title: More Menu - Buy MLB Audio
custom_steps:
1. Remain in app as Lite user
2. Tap "More" to open More Menu
3. Note upsell option at top of menu
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
Buy MLB Audio

title: More Menu - Buy MLB Audio - Icon
custom_steps:
1. Remain in app as Lite user
2. Tap "More" to open More Menu
3. Note "Buy MLB Audio" upsell option at top of menu
custom_expected: Headphones icon should be next to text

title: More Menu - Buy MLB Audio - Paywall - Image
custom_steps:
1. Remain in app as Lite user
2. Tap "More" to open More Menu
3. Note "Buy MLB Audio" upsell option at top of menu
4. Tap upsell
5. User will see MLB Audio paywall
custom_expected: Top image/text should show "MLB Audio"

title: More Menu - Buy MLB Audio - Paywall - Text
custom_steps:
1. Remain in app as Lite user
2. Tap "More" to open More Menu
3. Note "Buy MLB Audio" upsell option at top of menu
4. Tap upsell
5. User will see MLB Audio paywall
custom_expected:
Text on paywall will read:
Subscribe to MLB Audio

title: More Menu - Buy MLB Audio - Paywall - Fine Print
custom_steps:
1. Remain in app as Lite user
2. Tap "More" to open More Menu
3. Note "Buy MLB Audio" upsell option at top of menu
4. Tap upsell
5. User will see MLB Audio paywall
custom_expected:
Fine print on paywall will read:
MLB Audio is recurring subscription...

title: More Menu - Ask MLB App
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to open More Menu
2. Note option near top of menu with microphone icon
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
Ask MLB

title: More Menu - Ask MLB App - Pop-up Title
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to open More Menu
2. Tap to launch "Ask MLB"
3. User is prompted with pop-up describing the feature
custom_expected:
Title text should read: 
Welcome to Ask MLB

title: More Menu - Ask MLB App - Pop-up Body Text
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to open More Menu
2. Tap to launch "Ask MLB"
3. User is prompted with pop-up describing the feature
custom_expected:
Body text should read: 
Ask MLB -- a new way to get quick answers to baseball questions...

title: More Menu - Ask MLB App - UIAlert - Microphone Access
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to open More Menu
2. Tap to launch "Ask MLB"
3. User sees pop-up describing the feature
4. Dismiss pop-up
5. User sees pop-up alert for microphone permissions
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
"MLB" Would Like to Access the Microphone
We need microphone access so you can ask questions using your voice. We only access the microphone when you use "Ask MLB."

title: More Menu - Ask MLB App - UIAlert - Speech Recognition
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to open More Menu
2. Tap to launch "Ask MLB"
3. User sees pop-up describing the feature
4. Dismiss pop-up
5. User sees pop-up alert for microphone permissions
6. Allow permissions
7. User sees pop-up alert for speech recognition permissions
custom_expected:
Text should read:
"MLB" Would Like to Access Speech Recognition
Speech data from this app will be sent to Apple to process your requests. This will help Apple improve its speech recognition technology.
We use Apple's speech recognition to turn your speech into text when you use "Ask MLB."

title: More Menu - Settings - Home Screen Icon
custom_preconds:
MLB App is installed
Home Screen Icon is default MLB
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to launch More Menu
2. Tap to launch "Settings"
3. Tap to open "Set Home Screen Icon"
custom_expected:
Text should read:
Select a team to change the MLB App icon on your Home Screen

title: More Menu - Settings - Home Screen Icon - MLB Icon
custom_preconds:
MLB App is installed
Home Screen Icon is default MLB
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to launch More Menu
2. Tap to launch "Settings"
3. Tap to open "Set Home Screen Icon"
custom_expected: MLB logo should be updated icon, with blue gradient background

title: More Menu - Settings - "About MLB App"
custom_steps:
1. Remain in app as Lite user
2. Tap "More" to open More Menu
3. Tap "Settings"
4. Note last item in Settings
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
About MLB App

title: More Menu - Settings - "About MLB App" - Title
custom_steps:
1. Remain in app as Lite user
2. Tap "More" to open More Menu
3. Tap "Settings"
4. Tap to open "About MLB App"
5. Note page title
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
About MLB App

title: More Menu - Sections - UIAlert - External Link
custom_steps:
1. Remain in app as Lite user
2. Tap "More" to open More Menu
3. From "Sections", tap "Social Clubhouse"
4. User is prompted if they'd like to exit the app to view this link
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
Leave MLB App? Would you like to exit MLB App to view this link?

title: MLB.TV - "Play Ball!" Screen
custom_preconds:
MLB App is installed
User is logged in with TV-entitled account
custom_steps:
1. Tap TV icon to launch MLB.TV EPG
2. Tap to launch an archive (check past dates if none on current)
3. View "Play Ball!" screen
custom_expected:
"Play Ball!" screen will read:
MLB App has determined...

title: App Name - Push Notifications
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to launch More Menu
2. Tap to launch "Settings"
3. Tap to open "Notifications"
4. Ensure push notifications and some push channels are enabled
5. Receive push notification
custom_expected: App name should appear as "MLB"

title: App Launch Icon - Push Notifications
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to launch More Menu
2. Tap to launch "Settings"
3. Tap to open "Notifications"
4. Ensure push notifications and some push channels are enabled
5. Receive push notification
custom_expected: MLB icon should be updated, with blue gradient background

title: Home Screen - App Name
custom_steps:
1. Install MLB App
2. Nav to device home screen
custom_expected: App name should be "MLB"

title: Home Screen - App Logo
custom_steps:
1. Install MLB App
2. Nav to device home screen
custom_expected: App logo should be updated, MLB logo with blue gradient background

title: Device Settings - App Name
custom_steps:
1. Device Settings
2. Scroll to MLB
custom_expected: App name should be "MLB"

title: Device Settings - App Icon
custom_steps:
1. Device Settings
2. Scroll to MLB
custom_expected: App icon should have blue gradient background

title: Device - Spotlight - App Name
custom_steps:
1. Swipe from the left on device home screen to bring up Spotlight search 
2. Type "MLB"
custom_expected: Search results should display app name as "MLB"

title: Device - Spotlight - App Icon
custom_steps:
1. Swipe from the left on device home screen to bring up Spotlight search 
2. Type "MLB"
custom_expected: Search results should display app icon with blue gradient background

title: App Store - App Name
custom_steps:
1. Open Apple App Store
2. Type "MLB" into search
custom_expected: "MLB" App will appear with correct name

title: App Store - App Icon
custom_steps:
1. Open Apple App Store
2. Type "MLB" into search
custom_expected: "MLB" App will appear with correct logo with blue gradient background

title: In-App Purchase - Connect Purchase
custom_preconds:
MLB App is installed
Lite user
custom_steps:
1. Tap headphones icon
2. User will see MLB Audio paywall
3. Tap purchase button to make an in-app purchase
4. Complete purchase
5. User will see Connect Purchase screen
custom_expected:
Text will read:
Connect your MLB.com account to access MLB App & MLB Audio on supported devices.

2. Type "MLB"
custom_expected: Search results should display app icon with blue gradient background

title: App Store - App Name
custom_steps:
1. Open Apple App Store
2. Type "MLB" into search
custom_expected: "MLB" App will appear with correct name

title: App Store - App Icon
custom_steps:
1. Open Apple App Store
2. Type "MLB" into search
custom_expected: "MLB" App will appear with correct logo with blue gradient background

title: In-App Purchase - Connect Purchase
custom_preconds:
MLB App is installed
Lite user
custom_steps:
1. Tap headphones icon
2. User will see MLB Audio paywall
3. Tap purchase button to make an in-app purchase
4. Complete purchase
5. User will see Connect Purchase screen
custom_expected:
Text will read:
Connect your MLB.com account to access MLB App & MLB Audio on supported devices.

title: Onboarding - Image in Onboarding Video
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. View Onboarding Video
custom_expected: User should see MLB logo with "MLB" text

title: Onboarding - UIAlert - Bluetooth Permissions
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. User sees alert for Bluetooth permissions
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
"MLB" Would Like to Use Bluetooth

title: Onboarding - Favorite Team Selection
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. User hits Favorite Teams selection screen in onboarding
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
Select your favorite team(s) to personalize MLB App's home screen and scoreboard. You can change them at any time.

title: Onboarding - UIAlert - Location Permissions
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. Go through onboarding
4. After favorite team selection, user is prompted with Location permissions
custom_expected:
Text of alert should read: 
Allow "MLB" to access your location?

title: Onboarding - UIAlert - Push Notification Permissions
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. Go through onboarding
4. After push notification setting selection, user is prompted with Push Notification permissions
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
"MLB" Would Like to Send You Notifications

title: Onboarding Paywall - Fine Print
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install app
2. Launch app
3. Go through onboarding
4. User will see paywall
custom_expected:
Fine print on paywall will read:
MLB Audio and MLB.TV are recurring subscriptions..

title: Team Page - UIAlert - First Time MLB App with Siri
Team Page - First Time Personalize MLB App Icon
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install MLB App
2. Set favorite team during onboarding
3. Complete onboarding
4. User should land on favorite team page
5. User will be prompted with "Personalize your home screen" pop-up
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
Select the [team] to change the MLB App icon on your home screen

title: Team Page - First Time Personalize MLB App Icon - MLB Icon
custom_steps:
1. Fresh install MLB App
2. Set favorite team during onboarding
3. Complete onboarding
4. User should land on favorite team page
5. User will be prompted with "Personalize your home screen" pop-up
custom_expected: MLB logo should be updated icon, with blue gradient background

title: More Menu - Sections - UIAlert - External Link
custom_steps:
1. Remain in app as Lite user
2. Tap "More" to open More Menu
3. From "Sections", tap "Social Clubhouse"
4. User is prompted if they'd like to exit the app to view this link
custom_expected:
Text should read: 
Leave MLB App? Would you like to exit MLB App to view this link?

title: MLB.TV - "Play Ball!" Screen
custom_preconds:
MLB App is installed
User is logged in with TV-entitled account
custom_steps:
1. Tap TV icon to launch MLB.TV EPG
2. Tap to launch an archive (check past dates if none on current)
3. View "Play Ball!" screen
custom_expected:
"Play Ball!" screen will read:
MLB App has determined...

title: App Name - Push Notifications
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to launch More Menu
2. Tap to launch "Settings"
3. Tap to open "Notifications"
4. Ensure push notifications and some push channels are enabled
5. Receive push notification
custom_expected: App name should appear as "MLB"

title: App Launch Icon - Push Notifications
custom_steps:
1. Tap "More" to launch More Menu
2. Tap to launch "Settings"
3. Tap to open "Notifications"
4. Ensure push notifications and some push channels are enabled
5. Receive push notification
custom_expected: MLB icon should be updated, with blue gradient background

title: Default Gameday Background Image - Day
custom_steps:
1. Scoreboard
2. Find a game which is in progress, and which is being played during the day
3. Tap game cell to launch Gameday of that game

title: Default Gameday Background Image - Night
custom_steps:
1. Scoreboard
2. Find a game which is in progress, and which is being played during the evening
3. Tap game cell to launch Gameday of that game
